title: Kalaburagi
summary: Kalaburagi, also known as Gulbarga,[2] is a city in the Indian state of Karnataka. It is the administrative headquarters of Kalaburagi district and is the largest city in the region of North Karnataka (Kalyana-Karnataka). Kalaburagi is 623Â km north of the state capital city of Bangalore. It was incorporated into the newly formed Mysore State (now known as Karnataka) through the States Reorganisation Act[3] in 1956.
